body:
Hello everyone, I am trying to test the new comfort analysis components and I keep getting into this error. The Adaptive Comfort recipe component tells me my "analysis period of the energy simulation data and the analysisPeriodorHOY _plugged into this component do not align". At first I had no analysis period as the default was to a year. Tried adding one for a whole year the error was still there. I tried to putting a month or even a few days but the error persists. Any ideas on this?Has anyone encountered it? Thanks in advance. EDIT: Was solved by changing analysis timestep to hourly. Duh. Kind regards,
Theodore.
